Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe manage.py shell -c "
import requests
from apps.users.models import User
from rest_framework_simplejwt.tokens import RefreshToken

user = User.objects.get(email=''admin@segurifai.gt'')
token = str(RefreshToken.for_user(user).access_token)

r = requests.get(''http://localhost:8888/api/admin/dashboard/full/'', headers={''Authorization'': f''Bearer {token}''})
print(''Keys:'', list(r.json().keys()))
")
